title: State vs. John Doe
summary: The defendant, John Doe, was accused of data theft and unauthorized access to confidential company information. The crime was reported on December 20, 2023. The case was filed in the District Court on January 5, 2024. The defendant was found guilty of data theft and sentenced to two years of imprisonment. The verdict was delivered on March 10, 2024, by the District Court, Pune. The defendant was also fined, in addition to the imprisonment sentence.
verdict: In favor of the State, guilty of data theft
issues: Unauthorized access to a protected system, Theft of confidential information
damages: Total fine of $150,000, including a sentence of two years of imprisonment
